<p>Hi there!</p>
<p>I am a postdoctoral researcher with a Humboldt Fellowship at GEOMAR (Research Division 2 â€“ Chemical Oceanography) and at Heidelberg University (Institute of Environmental Physics).</p>
<p>My research focuses on air-sea gas exchange and the ocean carbon cycle. I use field observations, laboratory experiments, and modeling to investigate factors that influence air-sea gas exchange, including bubbles, surfactants, and the cool skin, and to scale these effects to improve estimates of the ocean carbon sink.</p>
<p>I have over 10 years of experience applying the eddy covariance technique to measure air-sea fluxes of momentum, heat, and COâ‚‚.</p>
